Address.label: Address
Address.value: 11075 ROSELLE STREET, SAN DIEGO, California, 92121, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Tandem Diabetes Care Inc is a medical device company that develops products for people with insulin-dependent diabetes. The firm has three key insulin pump products. The t:slim Insulin Delivery System can easily fit into a user's pocket. The t:flex Insulin Delivery System is used by customers with greater insulin needs. The t:slim G4 Insulin Delivery system is a continuous glucose monitoring enabled pump with a touch screen. Tandem Diabetes also sells pump-related supplies and accessories. Pump sales contribute the majority of revenue. The firm generates virtually all of its revenue in the United States.

value.name: Jean-Claude Kyrillos
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
